resources:
ThirtyDays Mythical Creatures
//Creatures Name, Description and Origin
Golems Made from mud, who have been brought to life to serve some purpose Jewish
Oni Wicked creatures who are destined into becoming Demon in hell Japanese
Cyclops Lawless people who are clever shepard Greek
Ogre Tall, Strong and Hairy Gobblers - Basically Shrek Etruscan
Leprechauns Sally, tiny and recluse mischiefs Irish
Gnomes Either a Desktop Environment or a Small Dwarf Swedish
Goblins Malevolent troublemakers Germanic
Faeries Faeries, Fairies, Fey, Foo, Faa Celtic
Gorgon Beautiful and terrifying creatures, having Snakes stead of hairs Greek
Mermaid Half Human-Half Fish-Full Imagination Babylon
Aqrabuamelu Scorpion Man who were created to sneak on to Gods Mesopotamia
Minotaur Body of a Man with head and tail of a Bull. Crete
Centaurs Body of a Man with lower half of a Horse Greek
Fauns Human-like upper body with legs and tail of a Goat Roman
Werewolf A human who can willfully transform into a Wolf Germanic
Loch Ness creature A water monster as it cannot live on land, also cannot then be believable Scotland
Griffin Majestic hybrid of Lion and Eagle, Guards of Great Treasures Egyptian
Phoenix Mythical Eagle-like creature who bursts into flame when grows old Egyptian
Basilisk Serpentine creatures who can kill with one look English(UK)
Unicorn $1B Mesopotamia
Dragon Dinosaurs like creature who can breathe fire, Vicks promoters Unknown
Bigfoot Hairy android American
Chimera Lion merged with Human or Goat Greek
Hydra Gigantic, snake-like monster with many heads, each of which could dispel acid Greek
Zombie Dead Inside, Filthy Outside Hollywood
Pontianak Pale frightening creature who prey on Men Malay
Banshee Genitive spirit who visits and warns Families of coming deaths Irish
Dybbuk Ghosts who possesses Humans for some goal Jewish
Vampire Fantasy blood drinkers European
Bogeyman Keanu Reaves Universal
Expand Card Collapse Card
